This class manages all of the plugins commands.

onGameCommand

public boolean onGameCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                             org.bukkit.command.Command command,
                             java.lang.String label,
                             java.lang.String[] args)
Executes a command that was ran in game or through the console.

Parameters:
sender - The command sender.
command - The command.
label - The commands label.
args - The arguments in the command.
Returns:
True if the command executed successfully; Otherwise false.

                            java.lang.String arg,

Executes a command ran through IRC.

Parameters:
sender - The user that send the command.
arg - The arguments in the command.
Returns:
True if the command executed successfully; Otherwise false.
